expo.name: FitTrack – Fitness & Nutrition
expo.description: Your all-in-one fitness companion. Track workouts, log meals with AI-powered food recognition, monitor water intake, count steps, and reach your health goals — all in one beautifully designed app.

infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses your device's motion sensors to track your daily steps.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to let you take photos of your meals for nutrition tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to let you select meal photos for nutrition tracking.
